page.title: 08Recreation
page.content: At home I play with Mr Pop, Dentist, and Downfall with my sister . We make camps and play in them. At school we play with balls, skipping roops, and hoops. We have a farm yard, number rings, Sorry, a car set, Mancala, metal puzzles and Scrabble for Juniors. The boys like to play with their toy farm machines in our sand pit.Sometimes they kick a ball around the yard. In the Summer time we have organised Rounders games on the school field, usually when the older children from Harbottle School are with us. We have an annual Sports Day with Harbottle School on our School field, to which pre-school children and parents join in.
